thread.section_title: New product topics in Answer HQ
thread.title: Evolution Bug, Random selections unauthorized

author: luiblur
title: Evolution Bug, Random selections unauthorized
text:
Product : EA SPORTS FC 25
Platform : PlayStation 5
Please specify your platform model. Sony PlayStation 5
What is your Gamertag/PSN ID/Switch ID? ItsRoman_
Which mode has this happened in? Ultimate Team™
Which part of the mode? Evolutions
Can you tell us the date (MM/DD/YYYY) that you saw the bug? 11/14/2024
What time did you see the bug? (HH:MM AM/PM) 9:00pm
What is your time zone? PST - GMT - 8:00
How often does the bug occur? Rarely (0% - 9%)
Steps: How can we find the bug ourselves? I was checking through the list of players I can use for my :The One Hundred Club" evolution and I received a message saying "you have lost connection to EA Servers" upon returning to Ultimate team I check my evolutions and I see this player I did not select or choose in "My Evolution" tab.
What happens when the bug occurs? Player got selected, suddenly the "My Evolutions" and "Evolutions" tabs looked empty. Upon me exiting and coming back into the EVO page, the player "Luis Suarez" was selected for the "One Hundred Club" evolution
What should be happening instead? It should not be activating any evolution if the game kicks me out of the servers, its unfair. I just want to get reimbursed my evolution chance to use on a different player
‌
